headline: How the OneStep Partnership Could Drive Growth for ZBH Stock
summary: Zimmer Biomet teams up with OneStep to integrate mobility analytics into mymobility, empowering surgeons and patients while advancing its connected care strategy.

raw.headline: How the OneStep Partnership Could Drive Growth for ZBH Stock

headline: Zimmer Biomet Announces Quarterly Dividend for Fourth Quarter of 2025
summary: Zimmer Biomet Holdings, Inc. (NYSE and SIX: ZBH), a global medical technology leader, today announced that its Board of Directors has approved the payment of a quarterly cash dividend to stockholders for the fourth quarter of 2025. The cash dividend of $0.24 per share is payable on or about January 30, 2026 to stockholders of record as of the close of business on December 30, 2025.

headline: Zimmer Biomet (ZBH): Reassessing Valuation After Prolonged Share Price Weakness and Improving Fundamentals
summary: Zimmer Biomet Holdings (ZBH) has been grinding through a mixed stretch in the market, with the stock slipping over the past 3 months even as revenue and earnings continue to grow year over year. See our latest analysis for Zimmer Biomet Holdings. Over the past year, the 1 year total shareholder return of negative 15.07 percent and a 3 year total shareholder return of negative 25.66 percent show that sentiment has gradually cooled, even as quarterly results hint at improving fundamentals.
